__e: We all think we're made of steel but we're just made of marshmallows.
He says your hands are soft, like a baby.
"The stars are as soft as flowers and as near."
Your hands are so soft, Grandma. I don't know what your secret is.
She has soft hands, see, and I guess...
Although, I must say, you have very soft hands.
You're too soft. Easy to kill.
Once he finds out how soft and round they are...
They're all soft and cuddly, but you never get to be with one.
